sentence: McCarthy has thrown his political weight behind Harriet Hageman, a Trump-backed congressional candidate who is challenging Cheney in Wyoming -- an endorsement that earned him plaudits on the right, a key constituency in a potential future bid for the speaker's gavel.
author: Melanie Zanona
title: McCarthy calls endorsement of Cheney's primary foe a 'special case'
